value:
Seth gave me some sunscreen, but...
it remains to be seen whether I'll be
able to evenly apply it to my back.

What a pleasant breeze... The climate
on this island is quite similar to that
of Renais. It makes me feel at home...

Do you think this attire is suitable for
battle? I'm accustomed to wearing
something a little more...armored.

I am glad Lyon was invited as well.
He spends much of his time in his
room, so the beach is a nice change.

That cloud looks just like my brother!
Well, somewhat, at least... Maybe not
from straight on... Do you see it?

I am Princess Eirika of Renais.
I've come bearing summer tidings
on behalf of $Nf.

One must approach all things in life
with full effort and focus. That is the
energy I plan to bring to this summer!

I have no wish to bring conflict
to these peaceful shores.

This heat and humidity are stifling...
And the lack of wind is not helping.

Oh, thank you! With this, I'll be able
to enjoy summer to the fullest!

I am Eirika of Renais. I have come
to the beach this summer to take
some time to enjoy myself.

We swam quite a lot today... I'd say
it's about time for a break. What do
you think, $Nu?$k$pEven though I'm tired, it's a pleasant
sort of fatigue. It feels different from
the exhaustion of combat training.$k$pIn a world without war, I imagine
every day could be as peaceful
as this...$k$pThat thought gives me hope for the
days ahead.$k$pI will carry the memories of this
summer in my heart no matter
what is to come.$k$pIt will be my reminder that it is
possible for people to laugh and
smile together.$k$pI will protect those dear to me, so
when the fighting ends, we can come
here to have fun again, together.
Let's go for a swim.
Summer is here!
What fun!
Look at all the fish!
So hot, so dizzy…
うふふ…
I'm Eirika. This is my first trip to a tropical island. I can't wait to explore!
Hmm? Oh, a cold drink for me? That's so kind of you.
The deep blue sea, the sprawling sandy beaches... It's just how I pictured it from my books. But even better!
Just look at this cute, spiny rock. Wait a second! It's alive!
There were so many great swimsuits to choose from. It was hard to select just one...
I wonder what Ephraim would have to say if he saw me wearing this...
I will always cherish the summer memories we made here.
The sand is so hot...
Is the sun too much for you?
Together!
